docs.text:
Welcome to Lurch Math


The Lurch Math Project brings together several different software components to create a web based word processor that is capable of checking reasoning, especially for mathematical proofs.  Currently Lurch Math is comprised of the following subprojects.




lurch
 - The Lurch app itself. Lurch is a mathematical word processor that checks the reasoning in users' documents, even mathematical proofs.


openmath-js
 - An implementation of (most of) the 
OpenMath Standard
 in JavaScript.


earley-parser
 - A JavaScript implementation of the 
Earley parsing algorithm
.


first-order-matching
 - A limited JavaScript implementation of a matching algorithm for expressions of first-order logic.




More documentation will be added here in the future. For now you can 
view this repository 
.
